attributes.action: Stop the changes to PIP and LCWRA.
attributes.additional_details:
Further austerity and "growth" on the backs of those who are earning the lowest in society and are in the most need of support is inhumane and cruel.

Multiple charities, as well as risk assessments done independently state this could leave up-to 1 million people worse off, as well as associated with further deaths due to the lack of a benefits system that supports those who need it the most. All while we have millionaires begging to be taxed more.

REVERSE THE CHANGES ON THE GREEN PAPER NOW.
attributes.background: The Government should reverse the changes about PIP and LCWRA stated on the green paper.
